title: Erdős–Tetali theorem
summary: In additive number theory, an area of mathematics, the Erdős–Tetali theorem is an existence theorem concerning economical additive bases of every order. More specifically, it states that for every fixed integer h ≥ 2 {\displaystyle h\geq 2} , there exists a subset of the natural numbers B ⊆ N {\displaystyle {\mathcal {B}}\subseteq \mathbb {N} } satisfying
